name: Woven Sweater
description: Although you hate your awkwardly racist grandmother, you'll wear this (useless) sweater till you die... Or you find something else to wear.

name: Shiny (Thin) Gold Vest
description: You thought it was your lucky day right? Wearing a vest of gold. Unfortunately it's an extremely soft material, and you'll most likely die with it equipped.

name: Woolen Sweater, Embroided with Wood
description: This actually works better than the Golden vest.. Hah, that's so strange.
